title: Secondary Intracerebral Hemorrhage (sICH) Score
desc: The Secondary Intracerebral Hemorrhage (sICH) Score quantifies likelihood of underlying vascular etiology in patients with ICH.

orgreference.text: Almandoz JED, Schaefer PW, Goldstein JN, et al. Practical Scoring System for the Identification of Patients with Intracerebral Hemorrhage at Highest Risk of Harboring an Underlying Vascular Etiology: The Secondary Intracerebral Hemorrhage Score. AJNR American journal of neuroradiology. 2010;31(9):1653-1660. doi:10.3174/ajnr.A2156.
